data.text: @nzherald Playing Russian roulette with peoples lives, putting the vulnerable at risk via an "ambulance at the bottom of the cliff" approach to isolation. Businesses still suffer, short staffed and short supplied. How is this a government that values kindness? #nzpol #COVID
@nzherald 7 days, yeah, sure like that will be long enough. Good luck expecting people to return to work feeling unwell and with no voice
@nzherald Stop this nonsense, it's costing too much...😁 😂

@nzherald About 12 ppl in my office got it and isolate for 10 days and when they come still don't put on any mask and walk around.its not to say we are racist against some ppl.its these ppl who don't wear mask at all and love to talk on the phone when working
@nzherald Wow double standards aye, changes rules like yr undies🤣

@nzherald All bullshitting around the world. There is virus when they want make puppet to people. Covid was dangerous 14 days isolation u safe now 7 days. Petrol fk around the world salaries shit. Food i cant even feed my kids properly. Fuck all politicians
